about_the_game:
Gent is a man who just wants some peace and quiet. Sometimes, though, he doesn't get what he wants. This time is one of those times...
When his (not) friend Pirate falls into a deep slumber, it's somehow up to him to save the day!
In order to awaken Pirate, he must brave the treacherous Bendy Town and locate the Goon Crystal and Bloodline Emblem.
But, he has no idea what either of those things are or where to find them!
Well... Guess that's why they call it an adventure...

Gameplay

ADVENTURE
Move about from place to place, talking to and investigating anything that moves and anything that doesn't.
You'll Think, Talk, Ask, Touch, and Attack your way to completing your objectives, using a classic command-based adventure system.
By selecting the right option for the right job, you'll help Gent as he solves puzzles, discovers secrets, and progresses story-lines.

VISUAL NOVEL
Experience the mystery and intrigue of Bendy Town and its various inhabitants.
Big, colorful sprites accompany all sorts of strange and bizarre scenes.
Whether it be a first encounter, gripping conspiracy, or fierce confrontation, you'll never quite know what's coming next as you storm through the "unique" story, scene by scene, line by line.

RPG
Delve into the dungeon and explore via a top-down, grid-based map mode.
Encounter a wide variety of unique monsters, each with their own personality and special voice performance
When trouble arises, enter a turn-based RPG and spam attack until the enemy is bested!
Or, build your repertoire of Specials and Items and blaze your own trail...
Just how many ways to break the balance can you find..?

...More!?
Tired of searching for the one option you need to progress? Tired of reading through our idea of what constitutes "writing"? Tired of hitting the Attack option!?
Naturally, Bendy Town has no shortage of other ways to kill time!
  • Bust out your handheld game console and enjoy raising your skill in a variety of games.
  • Seek out the rumored casino where they play the most brutal, high-stakes game this side of the Mississippi...
  • Enjoy a refreshing board game sesh!
  • Relax and catch some anime with a friend.
  • And... Fishing. (of course)

How will your Gent Toushin...?

Will you guide our Brutal Cook to the end of his long road?
Or will you fall before the finish line...
When you reach the end, will your good deeds lead you to glory...
Or will you be judged for the sins you committed.
Will you walk along the road that's been prepared for you?
Or bust through the fourth wall and walk out the front door...

All of that and more... is in your hands.
When Gent is Toushin.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game's humor makes light of some serious issues, and references in text various offensive and sexual topics.
There is no explicit sexual content or highly realistic gore.

short_description: Seeking the coveted Goon Crystal and Bloodline Emblem, the Brutal Cook Gent must face Bendy Town and its strange dungeon. Guide our reluctant "hero" as he faces unwanted attention from friends and foe alike in this "unique" experience of a game.
